long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Provide Selectbox Menu to sort MLB.com Prospect List.

# Features
* You can sort prospect list by using selectbox.

# How to use
* Once installed, you can find "SORT BY" selectbox at "https://www.mlb.com/prospects/"
* If you select specific category, the list will be sorted by it.

# Release Note

* 1.0
** Bug fix
** Change selectbox's style better.

* 0.2
** Bug fix

* 0.1
** Initial release.
